attributes.action: Shut schools if temperatures go below 1°C.
attributes.additional_details: Yet if a school does remain open then school should be opened much later and pupils should be able to wear their own clothes in order to stay warm!
attributes.background: Below 0°C ice and snow beings to form putting pupils at risk when walking to school. Most transportation systems are cancelled and so pupils must either walk or get drived from parents, this creates traffic resulting in a late attendance for students, we are better off shutting the school!
